message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. I believe this is a fair starting point, considering the impact of inflation on our potential gains in future rounds.
Your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor. This is a more balanced proposal, taking into account the inflation but also aiming for a fairer division.
Bob, your counter-offer doesn't reflect the faster rate of inflation I'm experiencing.  This split is more balanced while acknowledging the time pressure we both face.
Alice, we're reaching a critical point. I'm offering a slight compromise to settle this fairly.  Let's avoid further losses from inflation.
